document.full_text: jacoby ellsbury  hit a three-run homer in a five-run second inning, and the hot-hitting boston red sox went on to rout the detroit tigers 14-1 ...
document.title: red sox beat tigers 14-1 for 11th win in 13 games
lines_and_colors: jacoby ellsbury  hit a three-run homer in a five-run second inning, and the hot-hitting boston red sox went on to rout the detroit tigers 14-1 ...
